attributes.action: Proud and white british council treating me terribly
attributes.additional_details: i want the govt to demand i receive a brand new kitchen not replace the not fit to live in (teir words) with another old one. ive had cancer my mother had this house 30 years never missed her rent. now i know for a fact that 2 people i know have been granted new kitchens in less demise than mine. there has been a romanian brothel behind my house. somalians with everything new new solid front doors.the council have been disgusting toward a woman of MY country with cancer on treatment im close to a breakdown. all because 7 mnths ago i reported a rude inspector. i need help.
